attributes.action: Amend UK Trade Bill to protect the NHS in trade agreements with other countries.
attributes.additional_details: They say they will never put the NHS on the table in trade talks. We don’t believe them.
attributes.background: The Government voted out a House of Lords amendment to the Trade Bill to give legal protection against allowing any NHS services, or patient data, being included in trade negotiations with other countries.
